content:
DataFrame employees
+-------------+--------+
| Column Name | Type.  |
+-------------+--------+
| name        | object |
| salary      | int.   |
+-------------+--------+

A company plans to provide its employees with a bonus.
Write a solution to create a new column name bonus that contains the doubled values of the salary column.
The result format is in the following example.
 
Example 1:

Input:
DataFrame employees
+---------+--------+
| name    | salary |
+---------+--------+
| Piper   | 4548   |
| Grace   | 28150  |
| Georgia | 1103   |
| Willow  | 6593   |
| Finn    | 74576  |
| Thomas  | 24433  |
+---------+--------+
Output:
+---------+--------+--------+
| name    | salary | bonus  |
+---------+--------+--------+
| Piper   | 4548   | 9096   |
| Grace   | 28150  | 56300  |
| Georgia | 1103   | 2206   |
| Willow  | 6593   | 13186  |
| Finn    | 74576  | 149152 |
| Thomas  | 24433  | 48866  |
+---------+--------+--------+
Explanation: 
A new column bonus is created by doubling the value in the column salary.
hints: Consider using the `[]` brackets with the new column name at the left side of the assignment. The calculation of the value is done element-wise.

Pandas.code:
import pandas as pd

def createBonusColumn(employees: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
